title: 90/373/EEC: Council Decision of 29 may 1990 concerning the conclusion of the agreement establishing the common fund for commodities
header:
14.7.1990 EN Official Journal of the European Communities L 182/1
COUNCIL DECISION
of 29 May 1990
concerning the conclusion of the Agreement establishing the Common Fund for Commodities
(90/373/EEC)
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
The Agreement establishing the Common Fund for Commodities is hereby approved on behalf of the Community.
The Community shall deposit the instrument of approval of the Agreement with the Secretary-General of the United Nations.
The text of the Agreement is attached to this Decision.
The President of the Council is hereby authorized to designate the person empowered to deposit the instrument of approval on behalf of the Community.
This Decision shall be published in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 29 May 1990.
For the Council
The President
M. GEOGHEGAN-QUINN
